title.#cdata-section: Rio Olympics 2016: Scottish Olympians savour record-equalling Games

description.#cdata-section: Eilidh Doyle's relay bronze sees Scottish athletes equal their record 13 medals for a Games in Rio, matching the haul from London 2012.

title.#cdata-section: Andy Murray beats Milos Raonic to reach Cincinnati Masters final

description.#cdata-section: Britain's Andy Murray wins his 22nd match in a row to beat Milos Raonic 6-3 6-3 and reach the Cincinnati Masters final.
